snippet.title: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind | Release Date Trailer | Curve Digital
snippet.description:
Peaky Blinders: Mastermind - which can be pre-ordered on Xbox One and Steam for PC - is a puzzle-adventure game based on the multi-award-winning TV show coming to PC and consoles 20th August.

To celebrate the announcement, we have a brand new trailer featuring the vocal talents of Cillian Murphy, who plays the show’s lead, Tommy Shelby.

Pre-order on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1013310
Pre-order on Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/peaky-blinders-mastermind/9n3jd9j577gq?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

---
